meanings.definition: Infection with parasitic roundworms of the genus Strongyloides.
meanings.sent1: Strongyloidiasis can cause stomach pain and diarrhea.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with strongyloidiasis after conducting tests.
meanings.sent3: The strongyloidiasis in the soil seemed to have a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: Her strongyloidiasis was a tangled mess of worms in her intestines.
meanings.sent5: The image of strongyloidiasis wriggling inside me haunted my dreams.

meanings.definition: A disease caused by infestation with Strongyloides stercoralis.
meanings.sent1: The symptoms of strongyloidiasis include coughing and wheezing.
meanings.sent2: Strongyloidiasis is treatable with medication prescribed by a doctor.
meanings.sent3: The strongyloidiasis in his body played hide and seek with the doctors.
meanings.sent4: Her strongyloidiasis felt like a tiny army invading her body.
meanings.sent5: The severity of strongyloidiasis made him realize the importance of hygiene.
